sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.api.servers

Interface IServerFinder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IObservable<IFoundServer>, java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VanillaServerFinder

    public interface IServerFinder
extends IObservable<IFoundServer>, java.lang.Runnable
    Server finder, most likely a thread, which looks for servers on local network. To receive events, use observer
